world_airport.name: World Airport
world_airport.description: The Super Wings headquarters where all missions begin and end. A modern airport with advanced technology for package delivery and rescue operations.
world_airport.cultural_notes: International hub with diverse staff and visitors from around the world

paris_france.name: Paris
paris_france.description: The romantic capital of France, known for the Eiffel Tower, art museums, and delicious pastries.
paris_france.cultural_notes: French culture values art, cuisine, and elegance. Greetings often include 'Bonjour'

tokyo_japan.name: Tokyo
tokyo_japan.description: A vibrant Japanese metropolis blending ancient traditions with cutting-edge technology.
tokyo_japan.cultural_notes: Japanese culture emphasizes respect, cleanliness, and precision. Bowing is a common greeting

new_york_usa.name: New York City
new_york_usa.description: The bustling American city that never sleeps, famous for skyscrapers and diverse neighborhoods.
new_york_usa.cultural_notes: Fast-paced, diverse culture. People are direct and friendly

sydney_australia.name: Sydney
sydney_australia.description: A beautiful coastal Australian city with stunning beaches and the iconic Opera House.
sydney_australia.cultural_notes: Relaxed, outdoor-loving culture. 'G'day' is a common greeting

cairo_egypt.name: Cairo
cairo_egypt.description: Ancient Egyptian city near the pyramids, where history and modern life blend together.
cairo_egypt.cultural_notes: Rich in ancient history and traditions. Hospitality is very important

rio_brazil.name: Rio de Janeiro
rio_brazil.description: A colorful Brazilian city famous for carnival, samba, and beautiful beaches.
rio_brazil.cultural_notes: Joyful culture that loves music, dance, and celebrations

beijing_china.name: Beijing
beijing_china.description: China's historic capital with ancient palaces and modern developments.
beijing_china.cultural_notes: Rich cultural heritage with emphasis on respect for elders and tradition

london_uk.name: London
london_uk.description: Historic British capital known for its royal heritage and diverse culture.
london_uk.cultural_notes: Polite culture with queuing traditions. Tea time is important

mumbai_india.name: Mumbai
mumbai_india.description: India's largest city, home to Bollywood and vibrant street markets.
mumbai_india.cultural_notes: Colorful culture with festivals, music, and delicious food. 'Namaste' is a respectful greeting

arctic_region.name: Arctic
arctic_region.description: The frozen northern region with ice, snow, and amazing northern lights.
arctic_region.cultural_notes: Home to indigenous peoples who respect nature and wildlife

amazon_rainforest.name: Amazon Rainforest
amazon_rainforest.description: The world's largest rainforest, full of amazing wildlife and indigenous communities.
amazon_rainforest.cultural_notes: Indigenous communities live in harmony with nature
